-e ---

# 𒁱 DARA4 ⇔ 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 ⇔ 𒁯 DAR3 deer 𓄛 𔑳 𔑴 𓃴

𒁱 ≈ 𒋗𒋙𒋙𒐺𒀸 <> 𒂗 ≈ 𒀸𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒀸𒋙𒋙𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒁰 DARA3 deer

𒁱 𐀁𐀬𐀲𐀨 e-ru-ta-ra ἐρυθρός eruthrós “red” "deer"

*dashred = red, brown, blood

𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓏏 𓈉 | the Red Land, desert| dash-red ⋍ desert ⇔ 𓅟 𓏏 𓈉

The-Red : DARA₄

𒁱 DARA₄ | blood | darah@Malay ꨕꨣꩍ Austronesian *daʀaq *zuʀuq dugo
𒁱 DARA4 | blood | •derma > דְּמָא dəmā 𒄷𒄭 dāmu ደም däm ⵉⴷⴰⵎⵎⵏ m idammn 𐤃𐤌 adam ⇔ αἷμα 𓄛 deer
𒁱 DARA4 | blood | dhar > ἔαρ éar
𒁱 DARA4 | blood | δary ⇔ ⰽⱃⱏⰺ kry
𒁱 DARA4 | red | δary червен červen qırmızı crimson
𒁱 DARA4 | red | •derma དམར་པོ dmar po “red”
𒁱 DARA4 | red | ερυθρό erythró
𒁱 DARA4 | red | dearg, rua (dark-red) Celtic *dergos “red, crimson” PIE *dʰerg- “darken”

𒁱 DARA4 ⋍ 𒁯 DAR deer! Rotwild *DAN *δAN 𓃶 psan 𐁁𐀼,wild goat,

𓊃 𓈖 𓆑 𓂐 𓏥 ⲥⲛⲟϥ sangue “snof” (sic)
𓊃 𓈖 𓆑 𓂐 𓏥 ⲥⲛⲟϥ xūn ਖ਼ੂਨ 血 xuèn ⇔ 红色 hóngsè

𒁱 inna "fleece" 𒁱 DARA4 derma damask > шэрсць šerscʹ "fleece" ?
